string.value: After combining all the information I got through Zenumist, Alcadno, and #p2111006#, I realized the person that knew the missing alchemist the most was his wife #b#p2111004##k. I better go look for her.

When I asked #p2111004# of #p2111002#, she seemed to be on the defensive. She couldn't believe I actually talked to #p2111002#. In order to make #p2111004# believe in me, I better provide solid evidence... maybe I should find the #bpendant#k that #p2111002# wanted to give her.

After seeing the pendant, #p2111004# finally accepted the fact that I met with #p2111002#. She seemed distrustful of both Zenumist and Alcadno. According to her, #p2111002#'s experiment touched a nerve with an important secret of #m261000000#, and the presidents of both societies had been more than eager to keep #p2111002#'s work and the accident quiet.

Do you... Need me for something? #p2111002#? Why do you want to know things about him? I... have no comment on the matter! I can't stand the fact that people that don't know him are constantly gossiping about him... like he's some monster. I don't want to hear it.\r\n#b#L0# I met #p2111002#. I even talked to him.#l

...Did you know #p2111002# from the past? It doesn't look like you did, though... #p2111002# has been missing for quite some time. How can you claim that you saw #p2111002# then? When? and Where? \r\n#b#L0# That's by following #p2111006#'s afterimage to the past...#l

I have no idea what you're talking about... Please don't mention his name again. Aren't you just trying to be nice at first, only to turn around and make him a pariah? I really can't trust your words! If you really wish me to believe you, you must prove it to me with hard evidence.
I don't think I ever heard from him that he had a friend like you...

This... the drawing on this item is actually a rose from the snowfield. It's the very rose that #p2111002# gave me for his very first present. It's a silver pendant with the rose from the snowfield engraved on... #p2111002# had promised to give me this as a present, but... if you found this at his home, then... you really must have met with him...

I have no clue what #p2111002#'s studies were. Maybe he was experimenting with something very dangerous. Even so... the way the presidents of both societies have acted since his disappearance unnerves me. They went to his house, and completely sealed it off from the rest of the world. They even barred me from the place, and I'm his wife.

Not only that, but the two heads thoroughly searched De Lang's house, and decided to stay mum, as if they signed a confidential agreement. Since everyone's staying mum about the whole subject, other alchemists began speculating about De Lang, and the more they speculate, the worse his image got. I even heard a rumor that #p2111002# wanted to become the Black Magician...

I know in my heart that that's not true. De Lang is a peaceful, quiet man who just wanted to help others through his experiments with Life Alchemy. I don't believe he was conducting the experiment for the wrong reason.

Zenumist and Alcadno. They are both hiding the truth behind what happened with #p2111002#. Those two can't stand one another, and yet they cooperate on this. They are hiding the truth from all of us, and I can't trust the ones that do that.
I don't know what the truth holds. I ... do know that it is strongly tied to the very existence of Magatia as a whole.
Even if De Lang really committed a substantial crime... that's okay. I'd rather find out the truth.
If you did indeed meet #p2111002#, then please show me the evidence that you did. Otherwise, I don't think I can believe you.
